report_definition.name: Consumi e solvente recuperato
report_definition.sql_command: SELECT (SELECT OPCValuesTags.TagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=4) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateFrom%')) AND ((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192))) AS solv_rec1_ini, OPCValuesTagsFine.TagValue-solv_rec1_ini AS solv_rec1_dif, (SELECT OPCValuesTags.TagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=5) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateFrom%')) AND ((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192))) AS solv_rec3_ini, (SELECT OPCValuesTags.TagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=5) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateTo%')) AND ((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192))) AS solv_rec3_end, (solv_rec3_end-solv_rec3_ini) AS solv_rec3_dif, (SELECT OPCValuesTags.TagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=7) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateFrom%')) AND ((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192))) AS steam_rec1_ini, (SELECT OPCValuesTags.TagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=7) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateTo%')) AND ((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192))) AS steam_rec1_end, (steam_rec1_end-steam_rec1_ini) AS steam_rec1_dif, (SELECT OPCValuesTags.TagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=8) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateFrom%')) AND ((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192))) AS steam_rec3_ini, (SELECT OPCValuesTags.TagValue FROM OPCValuesTags WHERE (((OPCValuesTags.TagID)=8) AND ((OPCValuesTags.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateTo%')) AND ((OPCValuesTags.Quality)=192))) AS steam_rec3_end, (steam_rec3_end-steam_rec3_ini) AS steam_rec3_dif FROM OPCValuesTags AS OPCValuesTagsFine WHERE (((OPCValuesTagsFine.Quality)=192) AND ((OPCValuesTagsFine.TagID)=4) AND ((OPCValuesTagsFine.TagTimeStamp)=datevalue('%dateTo%')))
